original_text: Suddenly there was such a violent earthquake that the foundations of the prison were shaken. At once all the prison doors flew open, and everyone’s chains came loose.
korean_text: 이에 갑자기 큰 지진이 나서 옥터가 움직이고 문이 곧 다 열리며 모든 사람의 매인 것이 다 벗어진지라

sentences.original_text: Suddenly there was such a violent earthquake
that the foundations of the prison were shaken
At once all the prison doors flew open
sentences.korean_translation: 즉시 감옥의 모든 문들이 활짝 열렸습니다
